directions: Toast pine nuts in a dry pan over medium heat for 2 minutes until golden and fragrant. Set aside.
In a small bowl mix cream cheese, chopped prosciutto, fresh grated parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
Stuff mushrooms (leave the stems in and just pile the filling around them) and sprinkle with additional grated parmesan cheese.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.
ingredients: Low-fat Cream cheese- Â½ cup/125 gr
Parmesan cheese, grated- 4 tbsp. plus extra for the tops
title: Jumbo Stuffed Mushrooms with Prosciutto and Toasted Pine Nuts
